entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text:
@Delavegalaw @Lydiad1957 With the ban on pain meds, it’s going to be interesting to see how end-stage COVID19 patients fare with Tylenol after being taken off a respirator to die.

In other countries, they sedate the PT, but CDC policy is to prevent dying patients from becoming drug addicts.
